newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Hunas Falls up 11 pct on limited volume.
newsitem.headline: Hunas Falls up 11 pct on limited volume.

text.p: Hunas Falls Hotels rose 11.11 percent, or one rupee, to 10 rupees on a small volume of 1,100 shares in early Thursday trading, brokers said.
Brokers said Hunas affiliates won the right to be the agents for a big European travel agency.
"Other than the fact that their group has just got the agency and the positive sentiment coming into the market there's no real reason for it to move up," said a broker at Jardine Fleming HNB.
